{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3692659,"name":"Naroglu","username":"vuure","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/v/8dc957/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-07-29T12:56:18.706Z","cooked":"

We tried with and without robot code, changing PDP, with and without CAN connected and unplugged radio.

When we open robot power from breaker, wheels start turning instantly at full speed. We are using PDP 1.0 with 40 AMP Circuit Breaker , 3 Talon SRX and 1 Victor SPX connected to the Roborio 1.0 via CAN. Motors are classic CIM motor, comes with KOP.

Something is wired incorrectly. Do you have a photo of your wiring

One or more of your motor controllers are wired backwards - look on the motor controller for a M+ M-, those are the wires that should be attached to the motors.

image608√ó551 40.1 KB

image301√ó308 48.8 KB
